plays.text: Goal scored by John LeClair assisted by Jeremy Roenick and Justin Williams
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Jean-Sebastien Aubin
Penalty to Andrew Ference 2 minutes for Holding Mark Recchi
Goal scored by Mark Recchi assisted by Simon Gagne and Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Krzysztof Oliwa 5 minutes for Fighting Todd Fedoruk
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 5 minutes for Fighting Krzysztof Oliwa
Penalty to Wayne Primeau 2 minutes for Hooking Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Kneeing John LeClair
Goal scored by Dan McGillis assisted by Mark Recchi and Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to Paul Ranheim 10 minutes for Game Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Paul Ranheim 5 minutes for Crosschecking Darius Kasparaitis served by Todd Fedoruk
Penalty to Andrew Ference 2 minutes for Holding Keith Primeau
Penalty to Billy Tibbetts 2 minutes for Slashing Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Billy Tibbetts 5 minutes for Fighting Todd Fedoruk
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 5 minutes for Fighting Billy Tibbetts
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Interference Ian Moran
